original:
According to Robert J. Yanal, Arthur Danto's essay, in which he introduced the term "artworld," established the foundational framework for the institutional theory of art. This theory was further articulated by George Dickie in his influential article "Defining Art" (American Philosophical Quarterly, 1969) and expanded upon in his subsequent works, including
